pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, June 23, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will hold a call with members of Canada’s Building Trades Unions.

The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual conversation with the Financial Times’ Gillian Tett for Collision conference. The conversation will air on Thursday, and focus on Canada’s economic response to COVID-19.
